sumstate.description: Summary of the states and their formats
sumstate.format: deviceModel enum[0=individual,1=buderus,2=stiebel,3=tecalor,4=vaillant](); coolingModeState enum[0=off,1=on](); waterTemperatureSetPointValue float[-100.00,100.00](°C); waterTemperatureTopValue float[-100.00,100.00](°C); waterTemperatureBottomValue float[-100.00,100.00](°C); collectorTemperatureValue float[-100.00,100.00](°C); currentState enum[0=off,1=on](); elementInfo enum[0=ok,1=manualOff,2=manualOn,3=locked,4=alarm]();
